description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任安徽省政协主席、中共安徽省委副书记。在担任中央第五巡视组组长期间，推动了对原天津市公安局局长武长顺的调查。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the Anhui Provincial Political Consultative Conference and Deputy Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CCP. As the head of the Fifth Central Inspection Team, he played a key role in the investigation of Wu Changshun, the former police chief of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省齐齐哈尔市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Qiqihar City, Heilongjiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于黑龙江省的一所邮电专业学校。
description.en: A post and telecommunications vocational school located in Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾负责管理黑龙江省邮电事务的政府机构。
description.en: A former government agency responsible for managing postal and telecommunications affairs in Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 曾负责管理哈尔滨市市内电话服务的机构。
description.en: A former organization responsible for managing local telephone services in Harbin.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会培养党员干部的学校。
description.en: The school for training party officials of the Heilongjiang Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国邮电部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国邮电部

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院下属的负责邮政和电信事业的部门。
description.en: A former ministry under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for postal and telecommunications services.

description.zh-cn: 位于吉林长春的一所邮电高等院校，现为吉林大学的一部分。
description.en: A higher education institution for posts and telecommunications located in Changchun, Jilin, now part of Jilin University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国信息产业领域的主要报纸之一。
description.en: One of the main newspapers in the information industry sector of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在安徽省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会。
description.en: The Anhui Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的巡视工作领导小组派出的巡视组织。
description.en: Inspection teams dispatched by the Central Leading Group for Inspection Work of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原天津市公安局局长，因腐败问题被查处。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and former police chief of Tianjin, who was investigated and prosecuted for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

position.en: Deputy Secretary and Secretary of the Youth League Committee
Deputy Director of the Industrial Division
Member of the Party Leadership Group, Director of the Political Department

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国邮电部

position.zh-cn: 政治部宣传部部长、教育司副司长
position.en: Director of the Propaganda Department of the Political Department, Deputy Director of the Education Department

description.zh-cn: 1985年4月任政治部宣传部部长，1988年12月任教育司副司长。
description.en: Appointed Director of the Propaganda Department of the Political Department in April 1985, and Deputy Director of the Education Department in December 1988.

position.zh-cn: 常委、省委宣传部部长、省委秘书长、副书记
position.en: Member of the Standing Committee, Director of the Propaganda Department, Secretary-General, Deputy Secretary
Head of the Fifth Central Inspection Team

description.zh-cn: 王明方任中央第五巡视组组长对天津市进行巡视，巡视工作直接导致了原天津市公安局局长武长顺的落马。
description.en: As the head of the Fifth Central Inspection Team, Wang Mingfang led an inspection in Tianjin, which directly led to the downfall of Wu Changshun, the former police chief of Tianjin.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十六届中央委员会
中国共产党第十七届中央委员会
